languages.text: "Вольный... Торговец?" {n}Лицо старика вытягивается, и он с благоговением кланяется, шепча:{/n} "Я ждал... ждал и надеялся, что однажды смогу послужить вам, Лорд-капитан! В этом ящике..."

"Rogue... Trader?" {n}The old man's face widens in astonishment, and he bows reverently, whispering,{/n} "I've waited... I've waited for so long, hoping to one day serve you, Lord Captain! The crate—"
languages.original_text: "Вольный... Торговец?" {n}Лицо старика вытягивается, и он с благоговением кланяется, шепча:{/n} "Я ждал... ждал и надеялся, что однажды смогу послужить вам, Лорд-капитан! В этом ящике..."

traits.locale_text: "Rogue... Trader?" {n}The old man's face lengthens with astonishment, and he bows reverently whispering,{/n} "I've waited... I've waited hoping I can serve you one day, Lord Captain! The box—"

"Rogue... Trader?" {n}The old man's face widens in astonishment, and he bows reverently, whispering,{/n} "I've waited... I've waited for so long, hoping to one day serve you, Lord Captain! The crate—"

languages.text: «¿Comerciante... Independiente?». {n}El anciano se queda ojiplático y hace una reverencia profunda mientras susurra:{/n} «Llevo esperando... ¡Llevo esperando tanto, tanto tiempo para poder servirl{mf|e|a} algún día, Lord Capitán! La caja...».
languages.original_text: "Rogue... Trader?" {n}The old man's face widens in astonishment, and he bows reverently, whispering,{/n} "I've waited... I've waited for so long, hoping to one day serve you, Lord Captain! The crate—"

traits.locale_text: «¿Comerciante... Independiente?». {n}El anciano se queda ojiplático y hace una reverencia profunda mientras susurra:{/n} «Llevo esperando... ¡Llevo esperando tanto, tanto tiempo para poder servirl{mf|e|a} algún día, Lord Capitán! La caja...».

languages.text: 「ローグ…トレーダー？」{n}老人は驚いて顔をほころばせ、恭しくお辞儀をして小声で囁く。{/n}「お待ちしておりました…長い間、お待ちしていたのです。ロード・キャプテン、あなた様にお仕えできる日を！あの木箱は…」
languages.original_text: "Rogue... Trader?" {n}The old man's face widens in astonishment, and he bows reverently, whispering,{/n} "I've waited... I've waited for so long, hoping to one day serve you, Lord Captain! The crate—"

traits.locale_text: 「ローグ…トレーダー？」{n}老人は驚いて顔をほころばせ、恭しくお辞儀をして小声で囁く。{/n}「お待ちしておりました…長い間、お待ちしていたのです。ロード・キャプテン、あなた様にお仕えできる日を！あの木箱は…」

languages.text: “行商……浪人？”{n}老人震惊地张着嘴，恭敬地鞠了一躬，随后低声开了口。{/n}“我等了……我等了这么久，就是希望什么时候能为您效劳，舰长大人！这个箱子——”
languages.original_text: "Rogue... Trader?" {n}The old man's face widens in astonishment, and he bows reverently, whispering,{/n} "I've waited... I've waited for so long, hoping to one day serve you, Lord Captain! The crate—"

traits.locale_text: “行商……浪人？”{n}老人震惊地张着嘴，恭敬地鞠了一躬，随后低声开了口。{/n}“我等了……我等了这么久，就是希望什么时候能为您效劳，舰长大人！这个箱子——”

languages.text: "Frei... {mf|händler|händlerin}?" {n}Erstaunen macht sich im Gesicht des alten Mannes breit, er verbeugt sich ehrfürchtig und flüstert:{/n} "Ich habe gewartet ... ich habe so lange gewartet und gehofft, Euch eines Tages dienen zu können, Lord Captain! Die Kiste ..."
languages.original_text: "Rogue... Trader?" {n}The old man's face widens in astonishment, and he bows reverently, whispering,{/n} "I've waited... I've waited for so long, hoping to one day serve you, Lord Captain! The crate—"

traits.locale_text: "Frei... {mf|händler|händlerin}?" {n}Erstaunen macht sich im Gesicht des alten Mannes breit, er verbeugt sich ehrfürchtig und flüstert:{/n} "Ich habe gewartet ... ich habe so lange gewartet und gehofft, Euch eines Tages dienen zu können, Lord Captain! Die Kiste ..."

languages.text: « Libre... {mf|marchand|marchande} ? » {n}Les traits de l'homme se détendent sous l'effet de la surprise, et il s'incline respectueusement en murmurant :{/n} « J'ai attendu... J'ai attendu si longtemps l'occasion de pouvoir vous servir un jour, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! La caisse... »
languages.original_text: "Rogue... Trader?" {n}The old man's face widens in astonishment, and he bows reverently, whispering,{/n} "I've waited... I've waited for so long, hoping to one day serve you, Lord Captain! The crate—"

traits.locale_text: « Libre... {mf|marchand|marchande} ? » {n}Les traits de l'homme se détendent sous l'effet de la surprise, et il s'incline respectueusement en murmurant :{/n} « J'ai attendu... J'ai attendu si longtemps l'occasion de pouvoir vous servir un jour, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! La caisse... »

languages.text: "Hür... Tacir mi?" {n}İhtiyar adamın yüzü, şaşkınlık içinde genişliyor. Ardından hürmetle eğilerek fısıldıyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan, size bir gün hizmet edebilmek için uzun zamandır... Çok uzun zamandır bekliyordum! Kasa..."
languages.original_text: "Rogue... Trader?" {n}The old man's face widens in astonishment, and he bows reverently, whispering,{/n} "I've waited... I've waited for so long, hoping to one day serve you, Lord Captain! The crate—"
